column4: hi, i know repos stored in sources.list file. but what if I add a ppa? which file stores the ppa information? and btw how to check all repos that I am using? thanks.
is there a command that shows all repos I am currently using?
I don't know of one command, but /etc/apt/sources.list and /etc/apt/sources.list.d/*.list are what you are using.
